name: Keeping the Recipe
description:
You're working as a guard for a company, you're protecting the recipe to their famous "Chocolo Chonke Cookios" from thieves.

This is a game made for the Scratch jam

also to flex custom sprite rendering engine using pen(I forgot to note that it is very laggy)

Edit 1: Fixed a small issue where the score wouldn't be updated(what am I talking about all I did was add two more blocks)
